items.headline: I’m 83 and have a monthly income of $3,800. My estranged wife wants me to join her in Colombia. Do I go?
items.summary_en: “I have about $220,000 in savings and I have close to $300,000 in equity if I sell the house.”

items.headline: Airbnb suggests consumers are starting to feel better about taking vacations. Here’s why profits could still take a hit.
items.summary_en: Vacation-rental platform Airbnb Inc. on Thursday said demand held up through October and forecast fourth-quarter sales that were above expectations, but the company said spending on new services and political battles would cut into profits.
